body: Nice art, but what shitty story lol
Lol I think you're missing some tags

She was being sold by her friends... Her future bis bleak, addicted with S... Then gave a birth a baby without father/husband. No future for the kids.

In RL... protect your Daughter boys. And for boys... Be responsible. F as much as you want, but when it times to take responsibilities. Be a man and face it.
